LOCALE_PASSWORD_REUSE_DOMAINS.message:
Το εταιρικό σας password (χρήση σε ) έχει μόλις εκτεθεί σε ενα μη εταιρικό site .
Η χρήση των εταιρικών διαπιστευτήριων με άλλα sites είναι επικίνδυνη και απαγορεύεται.

LOCALE_PHISHING_ACCESS_SITE.message:
To gain access to the real site, it is recommend to use a search engine.
If you understand the risks, you may visit this infected site.
This action will be audited.

LOCALE_PHISHING_DOMAINS.message:
This phishing site may pretend to be another site.

Phishing sites try to trick you to steal your information
(for example, passwords or credit cards).

LOCALE_PHISHING_SECTION_DESCRIPTION.message: Protect from identity theft by phishing sites.

LOCALE_PHISHING_SECTION_DESCRIPTION_ZA.message: Phishing is a fraudulent attempt to obtain sensitive information such as usernames, passwords, and credit card details, by masquerading as a trustworthy website. ZoneAlarm Anti-Phishing will scan the websites before letting you insert any personal information and will notify you whether it is a genuine website or a phishing attempt. We strongly recommend that you keep ZoneAlarm Anti-Phishing enabled to avoid being exposed to phishing attacks

LOCALE_PLEASE_CONTACT_YOUR_ADMINISTRATOR.message: Παρακαλώ επικοινωνήστε με τον administrator σας
